Appearance

pocket-vueProgressive Enhancement for the Modern Web

A lightweight, Vue-compatible library optimized for sprinkling interactions on server-rendered pages.

Get Started
View on GitHub

Ultra Lightweight

Only ~9kb gzipped. No build step required. Just drop it in and go.

Easy to Learn

It is easy to learn as it contains only 16 directives and 5 magic properties.

Vue Compatible

Uses the same template syntax and reactivity system as standard Vue.

Progressive

Optimized for "sprinkling" interactions on existing HTML pages.

Simple Usage ​

html
<script src="https://unpkg.com/pocket-vue" defer init></script>

<div v-scope="{ count: 0 }">
  {{ count }}
  <button @click="count++">Increment</button>
</div>
